mapper.select: select y.yhid,y.hydh,y.hymc,y.dlmc,y.dlmm,y.yhbs,y.sfscdl,y.sjhm,y.yjdz,y.wxh,k.yhmc from M_YHB y inner join M_KHB k on y.yhbs=k.yhbs where y.dlmc=#{dlmc} and y.dlmm=#{dlmm}
select csmc,csz, csms ,bzsm from SJBC_XTCS_$yhbs$ where csmc=#{csmc}
mapper.update: update M_YHB set sfscdl='0' where yhid=#{yhid}
mapper.select: select hydh, hymc, dlmc, dlmm,jgdh,jgmc,lbdh,lbmc, APPbb,xtrq from MPAS_XT_HY where trim(dlmc)=#{value}
select csmc,zdbz, csms, csz from XTB_XTCS where csmc=#{csmc}
select dmmc,dmms,dmz,dmsm,xh from csb_dmms where dmmc = #{dmmc}

select csz from mpas_sz_xtcssz
where csmc like '%csmc%'
select distinct tjrq, rwbh,rwnr,cast(sj as varchar(20)) as txsj,cast(sj as varchar(20)) as xxsj from MPAS_GR_RWZX rw where rw.khdxdh=}{khdxdh} and rw.sfwc='0'
